Reviews.Title: Great camera and easy purchase!
Reviews.Author: Laurie K. Woods
Reviews.Content: I LOVE the camera!  Now that I own it and have unpacked the extras, I feel like in retrospect I'd have been willing to forego some of the (to me) less necessary additions and instead get a second, extended range lens.  Oh well...  I gave this 4 instead of 5 stars for this reason only.Caveat: if you buy this package, open it IMMEDIATELY!  The Nikon manufacturer's warranty must be registered no more than 10 days from the date of purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, low end accessories.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Camera is great! The accessories are a bit "low end" and I would recommend buying the pieces separately and it's about the same cost.

Reviews.Title: excellent affordable starter camera
Reviews.Author: T. Miller
Reviews.Content: comes with everything you need!  I love it!  I do intend to upgrade when I can afford it...but for starting out, it is exceptional!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Okay Package
Reviews.Author: Parrothead
Reviews.Content: The camera is great. Works great. The packaged items are okay. Not all Nikon items. The big flash sold was a vivitar. I thought i was getting a great package, but there were other combos sold by others where you get better items in the kit, but it did come with a 32GM sony memory card. I would get the package with the bigger zoom lens instead.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected
Reviews.Author: RedGoose "redgoose"
Reviews.Content: Buying the camera and all the accessories in a bundled package is definitely the way to go.  Nikon D3200 is the best valued camera I've found.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: recommend this item to anyone who wants more out of their DSLR without breaking the bank. Marvelous Images with amazing detail, images captured from the D3200 & D3100 can be found at this link eugenesimagination.smugmug.com . controls are very comfortable and easy to use. I have been able to capture stunning images wiht it without any issues, iso is fantastic for its price and quality is outstanding, I have never had an issue with Nikon in the past and continue to be a long term customer of their products. only one issue i had was not with the camera, more with the seller. not huge just the fact that in the descriiption of the items included with the package it says "25 free photo's, voucher included" I didnt find them in the box that the items were shiped in. nonetheless  that wasnt why i bought there product. i purchased it because it was a Killer deal. the photos were just a bonus taht made no difference with me.

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love it
Reviews.Author: Katrinka G.
Reviews.Content: Camera was great. Took it on my vacation got some wonderful pictures. Would recommend this camera to anyone. Love It

Reviews.Title: nikon d3200
Reviews.Author: mgallehos
Reviews.Content: Love the camera. Took a few days extra to get to me due to weather. But in all great price, great equipment.. no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Bernie Mc
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's birthday and he is so pleased with it, the company were so nice to deal with, as I called with questions prior to purchase. I received it quickly and all of the products were in mint condition. It takes amazing pictures!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Shona Besselman
Reviews.Content: STill enjoying all the toys that came with the product. I can't believe the value and variety of what was in the package.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Crystina Corbin
Reviews.Content: I love my camera. I was very pleased with the bundle deal. The only thing was the two lenses that were suppose to be included weren't in the box, but that was easily solved. I gave them a call told them my problem and easy as that they sent my lenses in the mail. No hassel.

Reviews.Title: Great package deal
Reviews.Author: Corey M. Lewis
Reviews.Content: It is in deed a great package deal, only one down side it should have come with an extra battery, besides that it is a really good camera. Easy to use and the accessories made it even better. I would advise anyone that just started photography to get this deal.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Val Hall
Reviews.Content: Have used it for about 3 weeks or so.Easy to use.Battery life great.Takes great pictures.Did met my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Accessories kit a great deal but be wary of shortcomings
Reviews.Author: John Peck
Reviews.Content: I recently ordered a Nikon D3200 that came in an accessories kit. No complaints with the camera and most accessories. It takes beautiful, high quality pictures and is relatively easy to use. The letdown was with the gadget bag, which was entirely too small. When I contacted Amazon to note it was not the bag depicted in the ad and was incapable of holding other "gadgets," they agreed to ship another bag. The replacement, however, was the exact same. I never heard back from them after I brought this to their attention again. No quibbles with the value and quality of the camera and components.

Reviews.Title: Excelent machine!
Reviews.Author: Thiago Carvalho
Reviews.Content: This machine is so good! Ir was a gift for my wife and now she is able to take many pictures.I recomend it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera bundle!
Reviews.Author: J. Dasti
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome!! Easy to use, takes great pictures. We take it everywhere we go.. We don't want to miss a thing.. I would absolutely recommend this camera!!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera & pkg deal
Reviews.Author: Lisa Marie
Reviews.Content: I love this camera & this package dealVery happy with this & all the items. Received on time & easy to use - auto & advanced options.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 Kit
Reviews.Author: Bobby Edwards
Reviews.Content: Some items in the kit, I will probably not need.  The Card reader didn't work, so I bought a media reader from Walmart, and now it works fine.  A nice tripod came with the system, and I will use that.  The Flash Unit I haven't tried, but the flash unit on the camera works so much better than the one that I was using on my old Olympus Evolt 500.  I am in love with the ease of use of the Nikon and the performance in low light situations, which is more than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Value!
Reviews.Author: michael butler
Reviews.Content: before buying this camera, we were hesitant. We looked at another camera, also from superfinds, which came with a 70-300mm sigma lens. It was $750, though. This one believe it or not came with everything pictured. the wide angle/HD lens (they are no bigger than my pointer *FYI*) are a great plus as is the flash motor.The camera is a great DSLR camera for those who haven't owned one before. The manual is very easy to understand and the circular dial on the body is not confusing at all. you just turn it to the mode you want it on and- boom! beautiful photo! It is great for action photos, portraits, macro photos, etc. while on Action mode, the camera takes about 70 photos per 2 seconds! Many reviews said that the camera bag would be moldy, but no, it was all in great shape.Even though we did end up buying a new lens, this is a great value! do not hesitate!

Reviews.Title: Nikon d3200
Reviews.Author: John Coker
Reviews.Content: Camera is really nice for the cost and takes excellent photos. It's the perfect size to carry outdoors. Nikon is a really nice product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: You can't beat this price it comes with a starter kit anyone can become a professional with this camera it's a great price you can't beat it

Reviews.Title: Great Package
Reviews.Author: Jolayne Neroni
Reviews.Content: Came with a lot of extras, probably more than I will ever use. Now just have to figure out how to use it

Reviews.Title: Nice starter camera
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Camera  very nice and bundle was an exceptional value. Camera is excellent choice for those venturing into photography for the first time.

Reviews.Title: As pictured! With quality items!
Reviews.Author: Natasha Epperson
Reviews.Content: I have been researching this exact camera for MONTHS. I even purchased one from another site, but cancelled it when I saw what this kit comes with for $200 LESS!!! I received the product just when it said it would come (3 business days, I even ordered this before New Years!) and the packaging was superb. If I ever need anything additional for my camera, I am sure to go to this person!

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera (Black) with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6…combo!
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an entry level DSLR camera and wanted to get as much for my money as possible…not having to fork out more cash for the extras I would need. I found this combo, and though there are a couple of items I already have (now duplicates), it had what I was looking for…and then some.So far I haven't been disappointed with my purchase. I have a bit to learn with this camera and I'm having fun doing it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality of product and satisfaction
Reviews.Author: Shailendra
Reviews.Content: They are providing very high quality product.Even some of the product is not from the Nikon, still its good to worth.Service also very good

Reviews.Title: Great product with an all-inclusive starter package at a great price
Reviews.Author: MaC
Reviews.Content: I strongly recommend this product to anyone moving up from a point-and-shoot. The camera is solid, takes great shots and has a breadth of potential for the amateur. I imagine it is of a caliber for those with more advanced needs and talents, but cannot speak to that.It is also fun!This package is ideal- lenses for your basic needs (a fisheye may be in my future . . . ), the auxiliary flash is perfect for capturing high-quality photos in a variety of lighting scenarios. I found the carrying case to be the right size, if a bit small. But at this point in photography, I am taking everything with me as I go, as I don't know what I will or will not need. I find the tripod to be beefy and sturdy. However, I carry two paperclips with me where I go, because, fully extended, under the weight of the camera, the top segment of the tripod leans. It is not significant enough for me to dock a star though.I have to say, this package arrived QUICK, well packaged and just as pictured. I am loving getting to know this camera better and encourage others to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: eduardo
Reviews.Content: Sent as I ordered. The only thing I dislike is that the bag has the brand yashica, not Nikon, but it is not a real problem.

Reviews.Title: Great product and Timely delivery! Thanks.
Reviews.Author: Jian Du
Reviews.Content: This "Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera (Black) with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 AF-S DX VR NIKKOR Zoom Lens + Automatic TTL Flash + Telephoto & Wide Angle" is a high value and perfect combination in a package.Great product and Timely delivery!Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera!
Reviews.Author: DAVID L. CHACON
Reviews.Content: Price was outstanding and I got more camera than I needed and I just have to get used to all of its capablities. I'm glad that I got mine with all the bells and whisles can't wait for winter to be over and I can take advantage of this camera!I would recommend this purchase to everyone!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: I've always wanted one and now I have it. Takes great pics. Now I need the wifi part for the pics to go directly to my computer.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Pamela Lloyd
Reviews.Content: Got this for my husband for Christmas, he saw a package deal at Best Buy but this package by far was the better deal more accessories and better price, It was quickly shipped and arrived early so that was a major advantage.It was packed very well and I know when he opens it on Christmas Morning he will be thrilled.

Reviews.Title: Very good Camera
Reviews.Author: Ybren
Reviews.Content: the shipment was on time, the camera met my expectations and the kid was very complete at least for a beginner like me. Recommended

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera (Black) with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 AF-S DX VR NIKKOR Zoom Lens + Automatic TTL Flash + T
Reviews.Author: Marcey Mitcham
Reviews.Content: So much stuff in here I haven't even used yet but I love the camera!! I have taken a lot of photos and they have turned out so nicely. I look forward to learning how to use all of the things included.

Reviews.Title: Mouldy camera bag
Reviews.Author: Rhianna
Reviews.Content: The camera and accesories are here. My biggest problemm (whic makes me wonder) is that the case is mouldy. Visible mould all over. I hope the camera wasn't exposed to water. I called the number but Focus camera is closed. I am going to go over everything with a fine tooth comb. I cannot recommend this product from Focus until I get an explination and a new camera bag.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Val Hall
Reviews.Content: Have used it for about 3 weeks or so.Easy to use.Battery life great.Takes great pictures.Did met my expectations.

ProductInfo.Features:
Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera Body (Black) - Nikon 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Nikkor Zoom Lens
Bower SFD728N Automatic TTL Flash - Telephoto & Wide Angle Lens Set - 52mm UV Protection Filter
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Well Padded Multi Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap - 5pc Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - BONUS!! HDMI cable for HDTV connection - Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code # on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera (Black) with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 AF-S DX VR NIKKOR Zoom Lens + Automatic TTL Flash + Telephoto & Wide Angle Lenses + 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
